code: static JaxbNamespacePrefixMapper newNamespacePrefixMapper(CamelContext camelContext, Map<String, String> namespaces) {     // try to load the Sun JAXB 2.1 based     Class<?> clazz = camelContext.getClassResolver().resolveClass(SUN_JAXB_21_MAPPER).     if (clazz != null) {         JaxbNamespacePrefixMapper mapper = (JaxbNamespacePrefixMapper) camelContext.getInjector().newInstance(clazz).         mapper.setNamespaces(namespaces).         return mapper.     }     throw new IllegalStateException("Cannot load CamelNamespacePrefixMapper class"). }
